Address: PO BOX 459 124 SOUTH MAIN ST, EDINBURG, Virginia, 22824, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Shenandoah Telecommunications Company ("Shentel", "we", "our", "us", or the "Company"), together with our consolidated subsidiaries, is a provider of a comprehensive range of wireless and broadband communication products and services in the Mid-Atlantic portion of the United States ("U.S."). Effective November 30, 2019, we realigned our reporting segment structure to align with how our CEO and chief operating decision maker ("CODM") allocates resources and evaluates operating performance. These changes follow an organizational shift during 2019 from a business line to a functional structure, to better delineate between our key products, and better enable peer comparisons by both our CODM and our investors. As a result of these changes, we have combined our legacy Cable and Wireline segments into a new Broadband segment and also bifurcated a Tower segment from our legacy Wireless segment.  ... More ...
